tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crm_third_party_integration (
    id INT,
    app_name VARCHAR(255),
    connection_type VARCHAR(50),
    synchronization_frequency INT,
    last_sync_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ThirdPartyApplications (
    id UUID NOT NULL,
    app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    connection_string TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_interval INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE CRMData (
    entry_id UUID NOT NULL,
    data_category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_sync TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (entry_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CRMData (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  data_field VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  data_value TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DataIntegrationLogs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  integration_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  error_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IntegrationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INT,
    crm_id INT,
    sync_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending',
    sync_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE crm_data_sync (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    connection_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_table VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sync_status BOOLEAN,
    sync_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
